Bash(python -c "
import urllib.request
import json
from pathlib import Path

# Read key from env file
env_file = Path\(''cadence-ai-nextjs/.env.local''\)
key = ''''
with open\(env_file, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    for line in f:
        if line.startswith\(''NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=''\):
            key = line.split\(''='', 1\)[1].strip\(\)
            break

url = ''https://rdsmdywbdiskxknluiym.supabase.co/rest/v1/content_queue?select=id,title,status&order=created_at.desc&limit=5''
req = urllib.request.Request\(url, headers={''apikey'': key, ''Authorization'': ''Bearer '' + key}\)
result = urllib.request.urlopen\(req\).read\(\).decode\(\)
print\(result\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import urllib.request
import json
from pathlib import Path

# Read key from env file
env_file = Path\(''cadence-ai-nextjs/.env.local''\)
key = ''''
with open\(env_file, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    for line in f:
        if line.startswith\(''NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=''\):
            key = line.split\(''='', 1\)[1].strip\(\)
            break

# Reset status to approved
url = ''https://rdsmdywbdiskxknluiym.supabase.co/rest/v1/content_queue?id=eq.46cb85ff-6748-4e78-bdd6-ea857dcdb1c6''
headers = {
    ''apikey'': key,
    ''Authorization'': ''Bearer '' + key,
    ''Content-Type'': ''application/json'',
    ''Prefer'': ''return=minimal''
}
data = json.dumps\({''status'': ''approved'', ''error_message'': None}\).encode\(''utf-8''\)
req = urllib.request.Request\(url, data=data, headers=headers, method=''PATCH''\)
result = urllib.request.urlopen\(req\)
print\(''Reset to approved - status:'', result.status\)
")
